heading: Grammar, Comparative and general. Gradation.
alt-heading: Grammar, Comparative and general. Vowel gradation.
general-note: Here are entered works on expressions which describe the relative amount of a quality in two or more objects, as in comparison, diminution, etc. Works on the change of one vowel to another accompanying a change in the degree of stress are entered under the heading. Grammar, Comparative and general--Vowel gradation..
